content: **crocheted top in drops safran the piece is worked bottom up with lace pattern and flounces sizes s xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-334 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 350-400-400-450-500-550 g colour 18 off white crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge ** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
